page.shortlink: api sql namespace result set object to grid component data object function
page.description: Convert the ResultSet to a Grid Component DataObject data and field arrays.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = ToGridComponentDataObject(DataArray as p[], FieldArray as p[], [, RowsToCopy = -1 as N [, StartRow = -1 as N ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: SQL::ResultSe
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The ToGridComponentDataObject() method converts the SQL::ResultSet to a Grid Component DataObject data and field arrays. This function is intended to be used with the Alpha Anywhere Grid Component and may create different formats in the future.
